mapper.select: select * from portfolio where artist_no=#{artist_no} LIMIT 1000
select * from portfolio where type=#{type} order by reg_date DESC LIMIT #{start_index}, #{end_index}
select * from portfolio where type=#{type} order by title LIMIT #{start_index}, #{end_index}
select * from portfolio where type=#{type} order by fan_number DESC LIMIT #{start_index}, #{end_index}
mapper.insert: insert into portfolio(artist_no, title, type, file, content, reg_date, revise_date, thumbnail, artist_name, artist_profile_img, fan_number) VALUES (#{artist_no}, #{title}, #{type}, #{file}, #{content}, #{reg_date}, #{revise_date}, #{thumbnail}, #{artist_name}, #{artist_profile_img}, #{fan_number})
mapper.update: update portfolio SET title=#{title}, content=#{content}, revise_date=#{revise_date}, artist_name=#{artist_name}, artist_profile_img=#{artist_profile_img} WHERE portfolio_no=#{portfolio_no}
update portfolio SET comment_number = #{comment_number} WHERE portfolio_no=#{portfolio_no}
update portfolio SET like_number = #{like_number} WHERE portfolio_no=#{portfolio_no}
update portfolio SET visit_number=#{visit_number} WHERE portfolio_no=#{portfolio_no}
update portfolio SET fan_number=#{fan_number} WHERE portfolio_no=#{portfolio_no}
